about_the_game:
Requires The Gathering Storm Expansion.


As the Imperium crushes outlying systems, the Rebels ally and strike back.

This expansion adds 3 new start worlds, 41 new game cards, 5 more goals, and start world choice, plus an optional takeover system, allowing players to attack other players' worlds.
